pr_title: Setup Search module to interact with the Search Rest Client API.

timeline.message:
Setup Search module to interact with the Search Rest Client API.

Add a Jest test with mock data for the module.

timeline.bodyText: Could we have some JSDoc please?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: I swear I've seen this constant just like this in other modules. Is it worth centralizing it somewhere?
timeline.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText: As discussed, Config is more ideal.
